data.title: Buenos Aires Vacation Rentals with an Accessible Height Bed - Buenos Aires, Argentina
data.meta_description: Find the perfect accessible height bed rentals for your trip to Buenos Aires Apartment rentals with an accessible height bed, house rentals with an accessible height bed, condo rentals with an accessible height bed, and other great vacation rentals in %{location}. Find and book unique accessible height bed rentals on Airbnb
data.text:
Rental unit in Palermo

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 250 reviews4.97 (250)

Chic Studio in the middle of Palermo. Don Julio

Diseñado con detalles exquisitos, encontrarás calidez en las maderas y una naturaleza presente en cada rincón, hacen de este hogar un espacio acogedor, para enamorarse. Ubicado en una de los barrios más vanguardistas de Buenos Aires #PalermoSoho en el medio del polo gastronómico y tiendas de ropa. No te olvides de probar nuestras carnes y surtidos vinos argentinos @donjulioparrilla en la misma cuadra. En verano disfrutá de la piscina con la vista de la ciudad al atardecer, son un plus El departamento se encuentra equipado con 2 camas individuales o bien 1 cama matrimonial tamaño queen. Le agradeceré me indique su preferencia a la hora de efectuar su reserva. También tiene cocina y baño totalmente equipado. Cuenta con A/C ( frío o calor), Caja de Seguridad, SMART TV 32" con NETFLIX, WiFi 12 Megas, balcón privado, entre otros El diseño fue pensando por mi, utilizando materiales cálidos y nobles como las maderas. Tengo varios ejemplares de revistas de turismo nacional e internacional como así también, libros de diferentes géneros pensado para lograr un espacio de lectura y relajación. La piscina y el solarium están disponibles para el uso de los huéspedes. La temporada de piscina es desde el mes de Diciembre al mes de Marzo inclusive. Se encuentra ubicada en el piso 10 del edificio y es de libre acceso a los huéspedes Estaré disponible para contestar cualquier duda que surga durante su estadía. Palermo Soho surge a partir de un auge inmobiliario en la zona en la cual diseñadores de moda, artistas, galerías y restaurantes de estilo deciden establecerse reformando antiguas casonas, convirtiendo la zona en un circuito de moda, arte y buen comer. Se denomina Soho evocando la mítica zona de Nueva York SoHo. Cuenta con ferias artesanales situadas en Plaza Armenia y Plaza Serrano (también llamada Plaza Cortazar). Ideal para visitarlas los fines de semana y feriados. Horario 10 am a 20 pm. En la Plaza Armenia hay un puesto para alquilar bicicletas y también está la parada del Bus Turístico, donde se puede disfrutar de recorridos por la ciudad. Ambas plazas se encuentran rodeadas por bares, restaurantes, confiterías, tiendas de ropa, diseño y decoración. Existe mucha vida nocturna alrededor de ellas. A media cuadra de mi casa se encuentra la parrilla "Don Julio" una de las mejores y más conocidas de la ciudad. Usted podrá disfrutar de una surtida variedad de los mejores vinos argentinos y deliciosas carnes servidas al mejor nivel. Plaza Italia : Centro de transporte urbano. Se encuentra a 6 cuadras . Tiene línea de metro "D" y transporte de colectivos. Avenida Santa Fe: Se encuentra a 4 cuadras. Tiene transporte de colectivos. Avenida Raúl Scalabrini Ortiz: Avenida de gran movimiento urbano. Se encuentra a 2 cuadras. Tiene transporte de colectivos. Estación Palermo: Ferrocarril San Martin. Se encuentra a 12 cuadras. Estacionamiento de autos: Se encuentra a media cuadra. Embajada de EEUU: Se encuentra a 20 cuadras de distancia. La tarifa incluye desayuno seco. Consiste en café, leche, té, cereales, cacao, miel, azúcar, edulcorante y "Mate" (bebida tradicional argentina). El desayuno es auto-servicio. Espacio guarda ropa y guarda equipaje: El departamento cuenta con un pequeño placar con perchas para colgar ropa y con un espacio para guardar un equipaje de tamaño mediano a grande. También hay 6 cajones en los dos laterales de la cama. Smart TV 32” con NETFLIX Wifi velocidad 12 Megas Lavadero de ropa: A media cuadra del departamento hay un lavadero de ropa a costo. Supermercado: A una cuadra del departamento hay un supermercado. Gimnasio: A solo 50 metros del departamento se encuentra "Always Gym" un gimnasio de primer nivel que ofrece pase diario a costo.

Rental unit in Recoleta

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 130 reviews4.95 (130)

Recoleta Chic, peaceful and elegant apartment

The apartment is newly remodeled with very tasteful details in its decoration and modern equipment. It is located meters from the Avda. Santa Fe where the best stores in the city are and very connected to its means of transport. The main room has a "super king" bed that can be assembled whole or separated into two single beds. The pillows are "smart" and the linens as well as the towels are of very good quality. The appliances are new and consist of oven and electric anafes, microwave, coffee maker, electric kettle, toaster and refrigerator with frezeer. The A/C is hot/cold and the fourth also has a ceiling fan for those who do not tolerate direct cold air. The hot water comes from the central boiler of the building so it facilitates long and pleasant baths. Under the kitchen table is a modern dishwasher. All doors have a key lock and the bedroom can be closed from your access hallway, staying that way in "private suite" with the bathroom. I like to socialize, I can take care of them at any time, by email or by cell phone. I live very close to the apartment, I can come if you need me. I provide guests with a complimentary public transportation card that can then be recharged at nearby kiosks. On the dining table I leave the instructions of the house as well as a guide with recommendations on shopping in the supermarket, nearby shops and places to eat with well-priced and good quality food. I can personally advise my guests on tourist attractions, restaurants or fun trendy places, museums, art galleries or shoppings. It is an exclusive residential area, where there are numerous bars, restaurants and boutiques to visit and walk around. Meters from one of the most beautiful squares in the city. It is located meters from Av. Santa Fe where a lot of bus lines circulate that take you within minutes to the main sights of the City. It is also 5 blocks from the metro (subway). Upon arrival I give you a complimentary public transport card that you can top up at the kiosks and a guide to the main sights. Check-in after 20: 00h has an additional cost of US$20. If the stay is longer than 8 days, they are given a set of sheets and spare towels.

Rental unit in Palermo

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 237 reviews4.98 (237)

Beautiful Recoleta Apartment with French Balcony

Perfect place for those who love green areas, museums, elegant residences, sophisticated decoration. The neighborhood is plenty of embassies, iconic monuments, and museums, and it is close to the heart of Recoleta. Public transportation (trains and buses) are available at walking distance. Ezeiza airport (international) is one hour in average from the apartment by taxi, and J. Newbery airport (national) is 20 minutes by taxi. It's important to mention that the building do not have elevators, so you will have to step two floors by staircase. The housekeeper will be in charge of the check-in and check-out and she will be available for helping the guests in whatever they need. Additionally, she will be able to make extra cleaning services (full cleaning to the apartment, washing dishes, refresh of sheets and towels, etc.) subject to previous guests request to the host (Guillermo) by AirBnb app. The extra cost is US$40 per day. This area of Recoleta is on the edge of an upmarket area called "La Isla". The apartment is half a block from the National Library and in front of the Book and Language Museum. There are also some great neighbourhood restaurants not far away. Av Las Heras is an artery with a great variety of buses that can take you to any part of the city safely and at low cost (on the desk of the bedroom you will find SUBE cards, which you can charge money in a kiosk located in Tagle between Pagano and Libertador - Please leave them in the same place when retiring) Also the apartment is located to three blocks from the underground Las Heras station (Line H) that connects with all the network of "subtes" of Buenos Aires. For taxi use, I recommend using the Uber or Cabify applications. Mr. Arnaldo Duarte is the doorman of the building, he counts with my all trust and he will be able to collaborate with the guests needs as well. The apartment is equipped with a safe-box in the closet of the bedroom, instructions to use it will be provided by the host (Guillermo) directly by email, wapp, or txts (reserved information) after the guest request.

Loft in Palermo

4.88 out of 5 average rating, 498 reviews4.88 (498)

Lovely appt, vip Buenos Aires area, w pool !

Awaken in a comfy bed by floor-to-ceiling glass doors. Pad across blond timber floors to a kitchenette in a bright and cheerful open-plan space. Swing in a hanging basket chair to plan the day's activities. Enjoy the amazing swimming pool in summer. The Best apartment in Buenos aires heart, you will love it. Full equipped. Hermoso departamento con pileta en el mejor barrio de Buenos Aires. • Ubicación PREMIUM. • Zona tranquila y segura • Cerca de los mejores restaurantes y bares de Palermo. • Rodeado de tiendas de diseño y shoppings a metros de los principales medios de transporte (Subte, Bus, Colectivo, Tren) 1 Cama doble 1 Sillon cama 1 Hamaca preciosa en el balcón TODO NUEVO TV smart 43" con NETFLIX y video cable Internet (WIFI) Aire acondicionado Calefacción por losa radiante En la terraza del edificio piscina y parrilla Mapas y orientación para turistas con algunos ítems de regalo para darte la bienvenida. Además de todo lo que uno necesita: sábanas, toallas, secador de pelo, heladera, horno, microondas, maquina de café, juego de ollas, utensilios de cocina y juego de platos y cubiertos para tres personas. Los horarios de checkin y checkout pueden ser flexibles. Usualmente el checkin es a las 15hs. y el checkout a las 12hs. Hermosa piscina y parrilla en la terraza del edificio Siempre disponibles para que disfruten de su estadía The apartment is in the premium Palermo neighborhood, a few blocks from the Forests of Palermo and Paseo El Rosedal. Shopping malls, restaurants, designer stores, a cinema, and transportation links are all nearby. Bright and shiny living room, amazing shower! Modern amazing appartment in the heart of Buenos Aires. Palermo best spot

Rental unit in San Telmo

4.98 out of 5 average rating, 120 reviews4.98 (120)

Sunny Top-Floor Flat Overlooking a Traditional Area

On the 7th floor by elevator of a quiet and rationalist style building, is this comfortable and super bright apartment of 70 m2 for 4 people. It has two bedrooms, the master bedroom with access to the balcony, has a queen size bed, a large closet, HD 42 "TV with cable, Netflix, and A / C cold heat. The second bedroom has two single beds, a closet and A / C cold heat. The living room has an armchair, a large window, a table for 4 people that can extend up to 6 pers, a sound system (eiffel) and a cold A / C. The washing machine and standing iron with steam are located in a room for services within the department. The kitchen with access to the balcony is fully equipped with microwave, oven, coffee maker, juicer, toaster, electric kettle, kitchenware, dishes and cooking utensils. The bathroom is complete with bathtub and natural ventilation. The balcony has chairs to enjoy a beautiful view and a sunny afternoon.The apartment is equipped with 100% cotton sheets, towels and quilts. The stay includes a set of sheets per person and two sets of towels per person. The replacement of sheets is for stays from seven days. 100 mg Wi-Fi (maximum internet band in the country) We receive and serve the guests in person to give them the keys and give them the instructions of the property. As a host we will do everything possible to make your stay in San Telmo a wonderful one! I'm available by Airbnb chat message. The apartment is in the heart of the old San Telmo neighborhood. The area has excellent restaurants and cafes, and it's well-connected to essential tourist spots. It's walking distance to the Puerto Madero neighborhood and Plaza de Mayo.

Serviced apartment in San Telmo

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 246 reviews4.96 (246)

Lounge by the Rooftop Pool at this Modern Studio

The studio apartment is new and the decoration has been inspired by the industrial look of the building. The apartment is fully equipped, with name brand appliance, 40" Samsung TV, full size Whirlpool refrigerator, Samsung Microwave oven, Oster coffee maker, Peabody toaster, etc. There is a double bed, as well as a sofa that turns into a sofa bed (allowing for an additional person to sleep). The guests will have full access to all the amenities in the building. As a host, we will do our best to make sure your time spent in San Telmo is wonderful. San Telmo is home to a growing restaurant district, Caseros Avenida, including steakhouses – organic and vegetarian – and bars. A short walk to Downtown, La Boca, or Museo Histórico Nacional, this studio is central enough for any stay in Buenos Aires. Near Metro Bus & other bus stops. Aprox. 2 km from subway.
